title: Stencil Sans Serif The Lollipop Shoppe
content:
Hi guys, I'm looking for the name of the typeface used in [The Lollipop Shoppe by Studio Makgill](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/2010.studiomakgill.com/clients/the_lollipop_shoppe) —or maybe a similar one—.  
Thanks in advance.

Here are some samples:

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749im_/http:/typophile.com/files/adc_5.jpg)  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749im_/http:/typophile.com/files/000664image.jpg)

Font: 

 The Lollipop Shoppe (custom made) 

Solved By: 

 [riccard0](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/typophile.com/user/46071 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [000664image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/typophile.com/files/000664image.jpg) | 76.11 KB |
| [adc\_5.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/typophile.com/files/adc_5.jpg) | 395.32 KB |
author: inperez

comments.content:
Did not spot an exact match.  
Here are some light weight geometric stencil fonts:  
Vacant  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/reserves/vacant/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/reserves/vacant/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/reserves/vacant/")  
Geomatrix  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeinnovations/geomatrix/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeinnovations/geomatrix/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeinnovations/geomatrix/")  
Jigsaw Stencil Light  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typotheque/jigsaw/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typotheque/jigsaw/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typotheque/jigsaw/")  
Stencil Creek  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/resistenza/stencil-creek/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/resistenza/stencil-creek/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/resistenza/stencil-creek/")  
Amundsen  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/juraj-chrastina/amundsen/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/juraj-chrastina/amundsen/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/juraj-chrastina/amundsen/")  
Sevigne  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/reserves/sevigne-st/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/reserves/sevigne-st/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/reserves/sevigne-st/")  
Fram  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/juraj-chrastina/fram/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/juraj-chrastina/fram/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/juraj-chrastina/fram/")  
Don

The name of the typeface is “The Lollipop Shoppe”:  
 [http://2010.studiomakgill.com/clients/the\_lollipop\_shoppe/typeface/the\_l...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/2010.studiomakgill.com/clients/the_lollipop_shoppe/typeface/the_lollipop_shoppe "http://2010.studiomakgill.com/clients/the\_lollipop\_shoppe/typeface/the\_lollipop\_shoppe")

To be clear, it's a custom typeface designed by Studio Makgill, exclusive for 'The Lollipop Shoppe' and, I assume, not available to sell.  
More alternatives: [Crisafulli](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/crisafulli) (not bad, a bit bold though), [Hiruko Stencil](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/thinkdust/hiruko-stencil), [Air Factory Stencil](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/khaito-gengo/air-factory/stencil), [Ne10](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/coreyholms/ne10), [Muirside](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/www.hypefortype.com/muirside.html), [Nimbus Stencil D](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/nimbus-sans/nimbus-stencil-d), [Eurofurence Modified](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/www.ffonts.net/Eurofurence-Modified.font)

The Lollipop Shoppe with inverted colors and in a Typophile friendly size, for easy comparison to substitute fonts

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LollypopShopSM_4522.jpg)
  
Don

Thank you guys for your answers and the substitutes options, they'll be useful!

Regards.

The closest match I've found is the Equo Stencil found here: [http://www.alfa60.com/FONTS/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749/http:/www.alfa60.com/FONTS/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110749im_/http:/typophile.com/files/equoSTENCIL_ch_01_5968.jpg)
